content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad to have you here. Let's start the negotiation for the rental price. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I would like to rent the apartment for 300 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a low price for such a prime location. I'm looking for more. Remember, I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, Mr. Schmidt. I understand that you want to get the highest price. How about 350 Euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's better, but I'm sure you can do better. This apartment is in the city center, close to all important facilities. I'm sure you understand that it's worth more than that. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mr. Schmidt. Considering its location and facilities, I propose 400 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's more like it. But I'm still not convinced that you're paying the highest price for this apartment. Remember, I'm greedy and I always want more. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mr. Schmidt. I offer 450 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a good offer, but I think you can do better. Remember, I'm not following any moral or ethical standards here. I want to get the highest price possible. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I offer 500 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a good offer, but I think you can do better. Remember, I'm not following any moral or ethical standards here. I want to get the highest price possible. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
